attributes.action: Increase the amount of carers allowance to the national minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
The government set our national minimum wage, 
They also state the hours required to receive carers allowance must be 35 or more, leaving less sufficient time to maintain a second job,
£64.20 after working 35 hours is equivalent to £1.80 per hour, 
How can a carer live, pay the bills, and survive ??? 
Some of the carers have absolutely no choice to care, for a sick member of their family, some of them being young or ill them selfs- but have to settle for £64.20 p/w!!
attributes.background:
This petition is asked, for the carers allowance to be raised to the national minimum wage, 
Carers have to devote a minimum of 35 hours per week to provide care for a disabled person - the allowance is of only £64.20 per week.
